G

Generate - Class in <Unnamed>
This class generates and outputs random points yielding x values within the following range:[-Panel2D.WIDTH/2, Panel2D.WIDTH/2) and y values within the following range: [-Panel2D.HEIGHT/2, Panel2D.HEIGHT/2)
Generate() - Constructor for class Generate
 
get(int, int) - Method in class Panel2D
This method swaps the order of the x and y values for us (so we don't have to swap them everywhere else in our code).

We could have many different instances of 2D char arrays that could display different graphics we design.

A coordinate point in the 2D plane.

pointLabel(ArrayList<Point2D>) - Method in class Panel2D
